page.title: 13Thame Events
page.content:
Thame Show. Thame show is held in the show field every September.It is the largest one day Agricultural show in England. There are a large variety of stalls mostly with agricultural products and machinery, other stalls sell items such as leather, toys china and so on.Besides the farm livestock there are also dog shows,a pets corner, flowers and plants, show jumping and an added attraction of parachute jumps or aerobatic display.
Thame Festival. For a fortnight in June/July the town enjoys a feast of extra events both sporting and artistic with a wide variety of music, dance, films and street entertainment. The event culminates in a street dance and the crowning of a festival queen leading a procession of floats through the town.
